readme.title: INSTALL - Markup, the XML parser for O'Caml

sect2.title: Prerequisites
sect2.p: &m; does not need any other packages besides the O'Caml core. The installation procedure defined in the Makefile requires findlib to workFindlib is a package manager..

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.p: It is not necessary to configure "markup".

sect2.title: Compilation
sect2.p: The Makefile defines the following goals:

li.p: compiles with the bytecode compiler and creates markup.cma
compiles with the native compiler and creates markup.cmxa

sect2.title: Installation
sect2.p: The Makefile defines the following goal:

li.p: installs the bytecode archive, the interface definitions, and if present, the native archive in the default location of findlib

sect1.title: The examples
sect1.p: In the "examples" directory you find several applications of &m;. They require that &m; has been installed using findlib. See the Makefiles in the directories for descriptions of "make" goals.
